thread.title: Perfect weekend in my favorite city
thread.title_full: Perfect weekend in my favorite city - Review of Hotel Daunou Opera, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: tgravell
title: Perfect weekend in my favorite city
text:
Love the location of this boutique hotel! Proximity to everything we needed and more.
Transit and tourist sites are a stones throw. Velibe rental is just around the corner Ride or walk to the Louve.
Nicely updated with great linens. Always high on my wish list.
And just when you thought things couldn't get any better, voil√†, Crossfit Louve is just 2 blocks away.
Buffet breakfast is a great way to start your busy day of sightseeing.
The young man at the front desk spoke perfect English and was so very helpful.
